title: TABLE- Top 20 vehicles sold in U.S. in March
text: April 3 (Reuters) - The following are the 20 top-selling vehicles in the U.S. in March as reported by the automakers and ranked by total units. Top 20 selling vehicles in the U.S. in March: RANK VEHICLE March 2018 March 2017 PCT CHNG 1 Ford F-Series P/U 87,011 81,330 +7.0 2 Chevy Silverado-C/K P/U 52,547 42,410 +23.9 3 Nissan Rogue 42,151 39,512 +6.7 4 Ram P/U 41,307 46,384 -10.9 5 Toyota Camry 35,264 35,648 -1.1 6 Toyota RAV4 34,937 32,027 +9.1 7 Honda Civic 32,584 31,520 +3.4 8 Chevrolet Equinox 31,940 22,671 +40.9 9 Honda CR-V 31,868 32,872 -3.1 10 Toyota Corolla 31,392 32,707 -4.0 11 Jeep Wrangler 27,829 16,336 +70.4 12 Ford Escape 27,370 28,113 -2.6 13 Nissan Sentra 25,123 21,960 +14.4 14 Honda Accord 24,171 26,824 -9.9 15 Nissan Altima 23,518 28,511 -17.5 16 Toyota Highlander 21,438 18,058 +18.7 17 Ford Explorer 21,020 20,232 +3.9 18 Toyota Tacoma 20,250 16,728 +21.1 19 Jeep Grand Cherokee 19,616 20,374 -3.7 20 Hyundai Elantra 17,323 25,063 -30.9 Top 20 selling vehicles in U.S. through March RANK VEHICLE YTD 2018 YTD 2017 PCT CHNG 1 Ford F-Series P/U 214,191 205,281 +4.3 2 Chevy Silverado-C/K P/U 135,545 128,467 +5.5 3 Nissan Rogue 116,454 101,421 +14.8 4 Ram P/U 103,964 119,199 -12.8 5 Toyota RAV4 91,459 80,533 +13.6 6 Toyota Camry 90,767 83,459 +8.8 7 Chevrolet Equinox 82,398 62,709 +31.4 8 Honda Civic 82,149 81,654 +0.6 9 Honda CR-V 82,046 94,057 -12.8 10 Toyota Corolla 77,820 81,435 -4.4 11 Ford Escape 67,350 76,338 -11.8 12 Nissan Altima 63,406 73,985 -14.3 13 Honda Accord 61,601 69,815 -11.8 14 Nissan Sentra 60,002 51,414 +16.7 15 Jeep Wrangler 55,504 41,311 +34.4 16 Ford Explorer 54,131 54,671 -1.0 17 Toyota Tacoma 53,779 43,493 +23.6 18 Jeep Grand Cherokee 53,448 56,600 -5.6 19 Toyota Highlander 52,882 46,642 +13.4 20 Hyundai Elantra 47,064 54,202 -13.2 (Compiled by Bengaluru Newsroom)
